title: Brazil’s CVM to pioneer tokenization use cases in 2024 regulatory sandbox
description: The Comissão de Valores Mobiliários (CVM) of Brazil, under the insightful leadership of Daniel Maeda, the superintendent of institutional investor supervision, has unveiled plans to delve into the burgeoning world of tokenization. Announced during the Rio Innovation Week on October 4, the regulator is set to explore a regulatory sandbox specifically tailored for tokenization use ... Read more
